entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is used to having three delicious meals a day, courtesy of his mother or the Hogwarts house-elves. He becomes unreasonable and irascible when he is hungry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is expected by Ron to come up with plans for finding the Horcruxes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also mentioned as someone who is expected by Ron to come up with plans for finding the Horcruxes.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a source of information for Harry about Voldemort's hidden Horcruxes.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as someone who has hidden the Horcruxes in places important to him.

relationships.description: Ron's hunger makes him unreasonable and irascible.
